Class MainFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • gui.MainFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class MainFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Contains the MainWindow of the application (the first that is launched at the start).
    Author:
    xinouch
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setProgressBar

        public void setProgressBar(int percent,
                  java.lang.String toBeDisplayed)
        display a progress bar and put its progression on percent / 100. as the application should be doing something important, the buttuns Apply and Launch! are disabled
        Parameters:
        percent - must be in [0, 100[. if percent < 0, progress bar in indeterminate state. Otherwise, the progress bar is hidden
        toBeDisplayed - a string that can be displayed. if null, default string ("percent %"), otherwise "String percent %"
